packages.name: [TOK]PartnersNeverMiss
packages.title: [TOK] Partners Never Miss
packages.description: Edits partner accuracy rate to preven't them from missing attacks.
packages.author: HunterXuman
packages.details:
This mod makes it so partners never miss attacks by editing their accuracy rate.

packages.name: [TTYD]HalloweenVivian
packages.title: [TTYD] Halloween Vivian
packages.description: This changes all of vivians known used textures and icons.
packages.author: HunterXuman
packages.details:
This changes all of vivians known used textures and icons.
Some UI, like the tattle log, isnt changed as I couldnt figure out the proper format to save it in

- VVA.bfres.zst
- VVA_Back.bfres.zst
- VVA_Dot.bfres.zst
- VVA_E.bfres.zst
- Info_PartyChange_Icon.bfres.zst
- Unit_Status.bfres.zst

packages.name: [TTYD]LoadingZoneRandomizer
packages.title: [TTYD] Loading Zone Randomizer
packages.description: This is a room randomizer mod that randomizes each room you enter.
packages.author: CaXaP
packages.changelog:
UPDATE v0.2:
• Now you can hold R when switching rooms to not randomize them.
• More glitchy rooms excluded
packages.details:
Good-old Loading Zone Randomizer similar to the one for the original TTYD. It randomizes the room when you switch rooms. And does nothing else. Special rooms like Mario and Luigi's house, title screen, ending and others don't get randomized to prevent softlocks.
Files Edited:
- main.npdm
- subsdk9
